name: El Gran Juego del Gusano
description:
The first game I made, back in the 90s!
It's a snake clone for MS-DOS, with no sound and some problems with sudden bursts of speed. 8D

Playable in browser thanks to js-dos: https://js-dos.com/

Controls:
SPACE - Start / Restart.
ENTER - Select Difficulty.
ARROWS - Movement.
